CHAT.comment: Book Reading; The Very Hungry Caterpillar

Chi is probably a very good reader , but it's hard to tell since she is clearly thoroughly acquainted with VHC; struggling on through and a few other words indicates that her reading is print-driven; She makes comments throughout , in addition to reading; notes say Mot is paying close attention , and she corrects Chi or asks her to go back to a word if Chi reads the word incorrectly

u.a: fades out on last few words
giggling is perhaps a reaction to a child (see context notes) who is screaming in the background
last 5 words still said quickly and with fadeout
child screaming in background; notes say Mot becomes a little anxious for BR to end because of this
reading more quickly , perhaps because of the screaming child
